docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Thursday:...
docs.lead_paragraph: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Thursday:

docs.snippet: Doctors treating Hall of Fame quarterback Jim Kelly said Wednesday he will not immediately undergo surgery for a recurrence of cancer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Doctors treating Hall of Fame quarterback Jim Kelly said Wednesday he will not immediately undergo surgery for a recurrence of cancer.

headline.main: No Surgery for Former Bills QB Kelly for Cancer
headline.print_headline: No Surgery for Former Bills QB Kelly for Cancer

docs.snippet: Bayer Leverkusen revived their hopes of playing top European football next season after beating Augsburg 3-1 on Wednesday to secure their first win in seven league games courtesy of two late goals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bayer Leverkusen revived their hopes of playing top European football next season after beating Augsburg 3-1 on Wednesday to secure their first win in seven league games courtesy of two late goals.

headline.main: Leverkusen End Barren Spell With Victory Over Augsburg
headline.print_headline: Leverkusen End Barren Spell With Victory Over Augsburg

docs.snippet: When David Moyes strode into Old Trafford for the first time as Manchester United's new manager, with its long red tunnel leading to the pitch where so much sporting history has been made, he knew the job of replacing Alex Ferguson would be, as he...
docs.lead_paragraph: When David Moyes strode into Old Trafford for the first time as Manchester United's new manager, with its long red tunnel leading to the pitch where so much sporting history has been made, he knew the job of replacing Alex Ferguson would be, as he now says, "tough." Few imagined it would be this tough.

headline.main: Column: Rebuilding United Make or Break for Moyes
headline.print_headline: Column: Rebuilding United Make or Break for Moyes

docs.snippet: West Ham United manager Sam Allardyce suffered an ignominious first after 43 years in football as his side were booed by their own fans despite winning a crucial relegation clash on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: West Ham United manager Sam Allardyce suffered an ignominious first after 43 years in football as his side were booed by their own fans despite winning a crucial relegation clash on Wednesday.

headline.main: Soocer-Allardyce Fumes at West Ham Boo Boys
headline.print_headline: Soocer-Allardyce Fumes at West Ham Boo Boys

docs.snippet: A socialite whose weight-loss supplement was linked to suspensions of several NFL players in 2008 for banned substances pleaded guilty on Wednesday to drug misbranding....
docs.lead_paragraph: A socialite whose weight-loss supplement was linked to suspensions of several NFL players in 2008 for banned substances pleaded guilty on Wednesday to drug misbranding.

headline.main: Socialite Pleads Guilty to Misbranding Drug Tied to NFL Suspensions
headline.print_headline: Socialite Pleads Guilty to Misbranding Drug Tied to NFL Suspensions

docs.snippet: Hosts Australia were handed a tricky opening round at the 2015 Asian Cup finals when they were grouped with twice former champions South Korea, Oman and Kuwait in the draw at Sydney Opera House on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hosts Australia were handed a tricky opening round at the 2015 Asian Cup finals when they were grouped with twice former champions South Korea, Oman and Kuwait in the draw at Sydney Opera House on Wednesday.

headline.main: Hosts Australia Draw South Korea in Asian Cup
headline.print_headline: Hosts Australia Draw South Korea in Asian Cup

docs.snippet: Once one of Arsenal's chief tormentors on the pitch, Paul Scholes dissected the Gunners with a withering verbal assault after a home draw with Swansea City on Tuesday ended any hope of a late Premier League title charge....
docs.lead_paragraph: Once one of Arsenal's chief tormentors on the pitch, Paul Scholes dissected the Gunners with a withering verbal assault after a home draw with Swansea City on Tuesday ended any hope of a late Premier League title charge.

headline.main: Scholes Accuses Arsenal Players of 'Going Missing'
headline.print_headline: Scholes Accuses Arsenal Players of 'Going Missing'
